snippet.title: The Room Accolades
snippet.description:
Fireproof Games would like to thank all those lovely people who bought, reviewed or otherwise enjoyed The Room.

http://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/the-room/id552039496?ls=1&mt=8

From release, The Room went to No 1 App, No 1 Game, No 1 Puzzle game and No 1 Adventure game in the US, the UK and 19 other countries in less than 48 hours.

We did this with zero marketing or PR, so be you a gamer or a journalist our success was borne by peeps telling others how cool it was.

We're eternally grateful :)

─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

AWARDS
 
•    Apple's iPad Game of the Year 2012
•    BAFTA -- Best British Game 2012
•    GDC Award -- Best Mobile/Handheld Game 2012
•    New York Video Game Critics Circle -- Best Mobile/Handheld Game 2012
•    International Mobile Games Awards -- Excellence in Visuals
•    International Mobile Games Awards -- People's Choice
•    TIGA Awards -- Best Game Design 2012
•    Pocket Gamer Gold Award
•    Develop Awards -- Best Micro Studio (Fireproof Games)

─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

PRESS QUOTES

BAFTA:
"An engaging, enigmatic, beautiful, slow-burn tactile puzzle game, perfectly tailored for touch screen play."

Game Informer:
"Excellently produced, clever puzzles and spine-tingling music"

Gametrailers:
"The touchscreen controls really shine. A must play"

Kotaku - Gaming App of the Day:
"More fun than Christmas morning and one of the best games on the iPad. Pay for quality."

Pocket Gamer:
"More suspense than a thousand bullet-riddled shooters"

Touch Arcade:
"You take the box in your hands, turn it over, peer closely, poke and prod. And it feels like it's there in your hands."

CNET:
"The Room is a unique and addictive app you should get right away, with great visuals, pitch-perfect sounds, and plenty more to keep you struggling to figure out just how to unravel the mystery."

IGN:
"The most realistically rendered objects in a mobile title to date."

EDGE Magazine:
 "What Fireproof has done is to literally wrap the mechanics of a point and click adventure around fantastical contraptions, before suffusing the experience with an air of ghostly mystery."

Eurogamer - App Of The Day Award:
"...resist hurrying and savour every sliding panel and twist of a dial. The Room is the cave of mysteries from everyone's childhood; a perfect encapsulation of the fear and pleasure of discovery."

The Guardian:
"One of the cleverest puzzle games to be developed for touchscreen devices from the ground up, as you explore a house and solve puzzles. The difficulty curve is just right, too."
